title: Check Local Court Rules
description: Before filing a motion, a paralegal must check the local court rules and the specific judge's rules for any special formatting or filing requirements.

tasks.description: Identify the court and judge assigned to the case.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the correct court and judge information.

tasks.description: Navigate to the court's official website and locate the 'Local Rules' section.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the general rules for the court.

tasks.description: Navigate to the specific judge's page on the court website to find their individual practices or standing orders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the judge's specific rules.

tasks.description: Summarize any specific requirements (e.g., 'font must be Times New Roman size 13', 'courtesy copy must be delivered to chambers').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a checklist to ensure the filing is compliant.
